sum_bart: NCC BSE Limited is a member of the National Company Law Tribunal, Hyderabad Bench (NCLT) The NCLT convened an adjourned meeting of the Secured Creditors of the Company on 30th January 2025 and was adjourned at the request of the participants thereat.
sum_peg: We wish to inform you that the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) has adjourned the meeting of the Secured Creditors of NCC Limited to 16th June 2025 to consider and approve the proposed Scheme of Arrangement between NCC Infrastructure Holdings Limited (Transferor Company) and NCC Limited (Transferee Company), and their respective Shareholders.
sum_t5: of the meeting would be subject to the approval of the Working Capital Consortium Lenders. The meeting was adjourned for the purpose of considering and approving the proposed Scheme of Arrangement between NCC Infrastructure Holdings Limited (Transferor Company) and NCC Limited (Transferee Company), and their respective Shareholders.
